author: Imperial13
title: wast o' time
review: this set is not very good! While the feature works okay theres no fun to be had cause he has no team! For fun get the feeder set, it actually is fun. this set also really needs a goal! And all you sticker haters! THERE IS A STICKER ON THE PUCK! The "container" it comes in is a water bottle!

author: reidak49
title: good
review: this set is nice but it all technic pieces and there are no arms i dont like the mask if you press the head doown he shoots the puck but not zig zags another thing is the container is a water bottle it is nice

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Sports (Hockey) - Puck Passer Review
review:
This figure is very easy to build and to play with. We also get a few stickers to worry about. This figure is very easy to maneuver as well. One thing which is interesting is that the canister of this set can be used as a bottle. The play feature as the same as in the other sets of the LEGO Sports (Hockey) theme: The head can be pushed down which will move the hockey stick which is going to hit the puck. It's a good set to have - even for pieces which you can use for future MOC's (My own creations) and/or brickfilms.

All in all this set is an good set and I would recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de
